message: I don't mean to be disparaging, but the RNC leader for the US Virgin Islands probably doesn't have a lot of leverage within his party. He underscores how the rational members of the republican party are small in number. The guys at the top created this Frankenstein (whether it's Trump, the Tea Party, our 4th branch of government known as the NRA, etc.) and now cannot control it.

message: I don't mean to be disrespectful and I'll admit that my tone was wrong But hear me out. I grew up watching, listening, and admiring every story, documentary, interview, and book I could find about America and her wars she's fought an the sacrifices our solders have made in the fight against tyrants and for freedom and peace. War is never pretty. But sometimes the aftermath of not fighting a war can be much worse. How's many more people have to die before we start to fight back Europe's already lost upwards of 500 people due to bombings and shootings.

message: """" Calm down and crawl in your Safe Space and pet a puppy."""" I keep seeing FOX news conservative using this line. I'm not afraid, so I don't need a safe space. However, the people who are afraid of terrorist attacks and illegal immigrants and people taking their guns seem like they do need a safe space.
